text: Verne Jay Troyer (January 1, 1969 - April 21, 2018) was an American actor, director, stuntman, voice artist, and comedian. He was tall. He was best known for playing Mini-Me in the Austin Powers movies. Troyer also guest-hosted WWE Raw on November 30, 2009. On April 21, 2018, Troyer died in Los Angeles, California while being hospitalized with alcoholism complications and a failed suicide attempt.Verne Troyer Dead at 49 at TMZ His manner of death was ruled as suicide. His cause of death was alcohol poisoning. ==References== ==Other websites== * Verne Troyer's Official website Category:1969 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Drug-related suicides in the United States Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Michigan Category:Participants in American reality television series Category:People with dwarfism
title: Verne Troyer
